layer at (10,316) size 790x60
  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {P} at (10,316) size 790x60
    LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 788x59
      text run at (0,0) width 788: "Below are four boxes all within each other, and a box overlaping other boxes. The 3rd inner box is red, and has an opacity of"
      text run at (0,20) width 783: "zero, and the box within it is black and has an opacity of 0.5. As the third box has opacity zero, the inner black is not visible."
      text run at (0,40) width 623: "The yellow block has opacity of 0.5, and is as the same level in the DOM tree as the 3rd inner box."
